title: Create India Government Portal with Jobs, Results, Admit Cards, News and Schemes

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store government job listings with fields including job title, organization name, post name, vacancy count, qualification requirements, application start date, application end date, exam date, official website link, and location
acceptanceCriteria: Job listings can be created with all required fields
Job listings can be retrieved as a list
Each job listing has a unique identifier

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store exam results with fields including exam name, organization, result declaration date, result link, and roll number range or category information
acceptanceCriteria: Exam results can be created and stored
Results can be retrieved as a list
Each result entry has proper date and link information

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store admit card information with fields including exam name, organization, admit card release date, exam date, download link, and important instructions
acceptanceCriteria: Admit card entries can be created and stored
Admit cards can be retrieved as a list
Each admit card has associated exam and download information

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store government news updates with fields including headline, summary, publication date, source, category, and external link
acceptanceCriteria: News items can be created with all fields
News can be retrieved as a list sorted by date
Each news item has a category for filtering

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store government schemes with fields including scheme name, ministry/department, description, eligibility criteria, benefits, application process, official website, and launch date
acceptanceCriteria: Schemes can be created with comprehensive details
Schemes can be retrieved as a list
Each scheme includes eligibility and application information

requirements.text: Build a modern homepage with a hero section showcasing the portal's purpose, navigation to all main sections (Jobs, Results, Admit Cards, News, Schemes), and featured/latest updates from each category
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays a compelling hero section
Navigation allows access to all five main sections
Latest updates from each category are visible on homepage
Design is responsive and works on mobile devices

requirements.text: Create a Jobs section page that displays all government job listings in a card-based layout with filtering options by qualification, location, organization, and application deadline status (active/closed)
acceptanceCriteria: Job listings display in an organized card layout
Users can filter jobs by multiple criteria
Each job card shows key information including deadline and vacancy count
Clicking a job card shows detailed information
Active jobs are visually distinguished from closed ones

requirements.text: Create a Results section page that displays exam results in a searchable list with filtering by organization and date, allowing users to quickly find their exam results
acceptanceCriteria: Results are displayed in a clear, scannable format
Users can search and filter results
Result links are prominently displayed
Recent results appear at the top

requirements.text: Create an Admit Cards section page that displays admit card information with filters by exam date and organization, highlighting upcoming exams prominently
acceptanceCriteria: Admit cards are organized chronologically
Upcoming exams are highlighted with visual emphasis
Download links are clearly accessible
Important instructions are visible without clicking through

requirements.text: Create a News section page that displays government news updates in a blog-style layout with category filters and search functionality
acceptanceCriteria: News items display with headline, summary, and date
Users can filter news by category
Search allows finding specific news items
External links to full articles are provided

requirements.text: Create a Schemes section page that displays government schemes in a detailed card format with filtering by ministry and eligibility, making it easy to discover applicable schemes
acceptanceCriteria: Schemes display with name, ministry, and brief description
Users can filter schemes by ministry and eligibility criteria
Each scheme card shows key benefits and application process overview
Clicking a scheme reveals full details including official website link

requirements.text: Implement backend query functions to retrieve the latest items from each category (jobs, results, admit cards, news, schemes) for display on the homepage
acceptanceCriteria: Query functions return the most recent items from each category
Results are limited to a reasonable number for homepage display
Functions are performant and can be called frequently

requirements.text: Design the portal with a professional, trustworthy aesthetic using a vibrant orange and deep teal color scheme inspired by official Indian government portals, with clean typography using a modern sans-serif font stack, generous whitespace, subtle shadows for depth, and accessibility-compliant contrast ratios throughout
acceptanceCriteria: Orange and teal colors are consistently applied across all pages
Typography is readable and professional
Layout uses whitespace effectively for visual clarity
Design conveys trust and official authority
All text meets WCAG contrast requirements

constraints: Must use single-actor Motoko backend architecture
Frontend must use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (hooks/useInternetIdentity, hooks/useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
No external database integrations or third-party APIs
nonGoals: Integration with actual government databases or APIs

required: Indian government emblem or Ashoka Chakra inspired icon for the portal logo (logo.dim_120x120.png)
Modern hero background image featuring abstract geometric patterns in orange and teal gradient (hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png)
Icon representing government jobs with briefcase or office building motif (jobs-icon.dim_96x96.png)
Icon representing exam results with document or certificate motif (results-icon.dim_96x96.png)
Icon representing admit cards with ID card or ticket motif (admit-card-icon.dim_96x96.png)
Icon representing news with newspaper or megaphone motif (news-icon.dim_96x96.png)
Icon representing government schemes with handshake or benefits motif (schemes-icon.dim_96x96.png)
